title: HOUR 2- Aug 24, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 2- Aug 24, 2020
description:
Dan Patrick gives his reaction to the Dallas Mavericks roaring back from a 21 point deficit to force overtime and beat the Los Angeles Clippers 135-133. Dan says that Doc Rivers has a problem because while they might be a better all-around team in the league they don’t seem to be on the same page.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dan Patrick gives his reaction to the Dallas Mavericks roaring back from a 21 point deficit to force overtime and beat the Los Angeles Clippers 135-133. Dan says that Doc Rivers has a problem because while they might be a better all-around team in the league they don’t seem to be on the same page.
